price: Yεngo (asotwee no) mu mma wͻn koraa, na emu na wͻbɛnya abamu buo.
arabic: لَا يُفَتَّرُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَهُمۡ فِيهِ مُبۡلِسُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: lā yufattaru ʿanhum wahum fīhi mub'lisūna
